S.FORM: zau kukuy utulu betin kelisiw, ngid pama tu zuma Ribang ni?
zao kokoy otolo betin kelisiw, ngid pama to zoma Ribang ni?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: qanengi iku meliway tu kelisiw timaisuan ni?
qanengi iko meliway to kelisiw timaisoan ni?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: qanengi ti! ngid isu tu qatani kelisiw?
qanengi ti! ngid iso to qatani kelisiw?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: kalingun ti iku mazas tu kelisiw, qanengi iku meliway tu kelisiw timaisuan ni?
kalingon ti iko mazas to kelisiw, qanengi iko meliway to kelisiw timaisoan ni?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: mai iku mazas tu kelisiw qaya ye!
mai iko mazas to kelisiw qaya ye!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: kalingun ti iku mazas tu kelisiw, qanengi iku meliway tu kelisiw timaisuan ni?
kalingon ti iko mazas to kelisiw, qanengi iko meliway to kelisiw timaisoan ni?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: qasukaw, ta ngayaw niliwayan su mai pama patadikud timaikuan.
qasokaw, ta ngayaw niliwayan so mai pama patadikod timaikoan.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: qanengi iku meliway tu qudus su ni?
qanengi iko meliway to qodos so ni?
kuwa, aisu pa mala.
kowa, aiso pa mala.
qanengi iku meliway tu sudad su ni?
qanengi iko meliway to sodad so ni?
paliwayan ku ti ti pipisan.
paliwayan ko ti ti pipisan.
paliway iku tu zitinsia su qanengi ni?
paliway iko to zitinsia so qanengi ni?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: nengi ti, wanayka temawaR patadikud iku ti.
nengi ti, wanayka temawaR patadikod iko ti.
S.TRANSL: 好啊，但是明天要還給我。
Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: muzan ti. mai iku siqawsua, paliway iku tu qawsua qanengi ni?
mozan ti. mai iko siqawsoa, paliway iko to qawsoa qanengi ni?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: ussiq ma qawsua ku, qatapun pa ita siqawsua!
ossiq ma qawsoa ko, qatapon pa ita siqawsoa!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐!
I only have one umbrella, we're all in this together!

S.FORM: nipaliwayan su timaikuan sudad zau, patadikud aka isu.
nipaliwayan so timaikoan sodad zao, patadikod aka iso.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: ngid pama isu tayta tu niana sudad qanengi semanu timaikuan.
ngid pama iso tayta to niana sodad qanengi semano timaikoan.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: qumni ti iku patadikud tu kelisiw su?
qomni ti iko patadikod to kelisiw so?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: quni, yau ti kelisiw su qawka patadikud.
qoni, yao ti kelisiw so qawka patadikod.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再還。
It's okay, you can pay it back when you have the money.

S.FORM: qumni ti isu patadikud tu kelisiw ku?
qomni ti iso patadikod to kelisiw ko?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: temawaR patadikud iku timaisuan.
temawaR patadikod iko timaisoan.
S.TRANSL: I will return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: qumni ti isu patadikud tu sudad ku?
qomni ti iso patadikod to sodad ko?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: siRab ussa patadikudan ku ti isu ni?
siRab ossa patadikodan ko ti iso ni?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: bilu zau nipaliwayan na isu ni buya ni?
bilo zao nipaliwayan na iso ni boya ni?
S.TRANSL: Did Buya lend you this pencil?

S.FORM: maqezaq, setangi deddan niliwayan ku timaizipana.
maqezaq, setangi deddan niliwayan ko timaizipana.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: niliwayan su ti buyan bilu zau ni?
niliwayan so ti boyan bilo zao ni?
S.TRANSL: 這支鉛筆是你跟Buya借的嗎?
Did you borrow this pencil from Buya?

S.FORM: ussa, niRasan na tina ku zau.
ossa, niRasan na tina ko zao.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: mai ti tu miyan, qatiw ka ti ipayan liway tu kiya miyan.
mai ti to miyan, qatiw ka ti ipayan liway to kiya miyan.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's go borrow some from Ipay.

S.FORM: kuwa, qatiw pa iku liway.
kowa, qatiw pa iko liway.
qatiw ika semanu ti ipay patadikud tu kelisiw ku.
qatiw ika semano ti ipay patadikod to kelisiw ko.
S.TRANSL: Go and ask Ipay to pay me back.

S.FORM: utani kelisiw niliwayan na timaisuan?
otani kelisiw niliwayan na timaisoan?
S.TRANSL: How much did she borrow from you?

S.FORM: qatiw pa isu seni?
qatiw pa iso seni?
qatiw pa iku sa bawbi paluma tu teded.
qatiw pa iko sa bawbi paloma to teded.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: qemuni isu?
qemoni iso?
muwaza ti suway, meRaysiw iku tu suway, antangi qapuzanuman.
mowaza ti soway, meRaysiw iko to soway, antangi qapozanoman.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: panmu iku mala tu sawki seRay tatak paqawtu qanengi ni?
panmo iko mala to sawki seRay tatak paqawto qanengi ni?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: sepawan su tanian?
sepawan so tanian?
sepawan ku ta kinilan na qaRut.
sepawan ko ta kinilan na qaRot.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: saqawang ti isu ni?
saqawang ti iso ni?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: Ruqulepun iku saqawang, sataqsaman antangi.
Roqolepon iko saqawang, sataqsaman antangi.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: qanengi ti alan nipaluman su tened ni?
qanengi ti alan nipaloman so tened ni?
S.TRANSL: 你種的青菜可以收成了嗎?
Are the vegetables you planted ready to harvest?

S.FORM: qanengi ti alan kulisay zau, buydang 'nay qaRayngu pama alan.
qanengi ti alan kolisay zao, boydang 'nay qaRayngo pama alan.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: wa! nazau ti qamuwaza nikutkut su tu qawpiR.
wa! nazao ti qamowaza nikotkot so to qawpiR.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: panmu iku sepaw ta siRan qanengi ni?
panmo iko sepaw ta siRan qanengi ni?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: qemuni imu?
qemoni imo?
yau imi pusalil qemapaR tu baut.
yao imi posalil qemapaR to baot.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: muwaza baut tazian ni?
mowaza baot tazian ni?
muwaza ti niqapaR niaq tu baut ta qipitan.
mowaza ti niqapaR niaq to baot ta qipitan.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: naqunian su Raybaut?
naqonian so Raybaot?
nizu pacingan ku ya baut.
nizo pacingan ko ya baot.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: suppaR isu pemani semalaw ni?
soppaR iso pemani semalaw ni?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: nizu tikasan ku qemapaR tu pasan, yauzuma sipisa mazas tu wasu semalaw.
nizo tikasan ko qemapaR to pasan, yaozoma sipisa mazas to waso semalaw.
S.TRANSL: 我都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I catch my prey in traps and occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: nisaqayan na babuy na naung lazan zau.
nisaqayan na baboy na naong lazan zao.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: manna suppaRan su?
manna soppaRan so?
zau nani qenazapanan na babuy na naung, Raqana lazan zau nisaqayan na babuy na naung.
zao nani qenazapanan na baboy na naong, Raqana lazan zao nisaqayan na baboy na naong.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: qatiw pa ita temayta tu tikas ta, azu matikas ti tu pasan.
qatiw pa ita temayta to tikas ta, azo matikas ti to pasan.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像獵到獵物了。
Go and look at our trap, for it seems that we have hunted our prey.

S.FORM: manna suppaRan su?
manna soppaRan so?
azu masingut na ti na wasu, qalazuq pa ita pasazui.
azo masingot na ti na waso, qalazoq pa ita pasazoi.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: yau isu semangi tu niana Ribang?
yao iso semangi to niana Ribang?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: zau nani qipitan ay tikas, satikasan tu mutun.
zao nani qipitan ay tikas, satikasan to moton.
S.TRANSL: 這是夾式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a clip trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: niana sepawan su tu tayan Ribang?
niana sepawan so to tayan Ribang?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: 'nay nani tiwa tikas, saqapaRan tu melimu.
'nay nani tiwa tikas, saqapaRan to melimo.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: wanay tu tazusa na baqbaqi bai, muwaza nisalawan ta setangi.
wanay to tazosa na baqbaqi bai, mowaza nisalawan ta setangi.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: en ya! azasan ta pa sa damu sinapun!
en ya! azasan ta pa sa damo sinapon!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: tiana Runanay 'nay?
tiana Ronanay 'nay?
tama ku aizipna.
tama ko aizipna.
tiana tazungan 'nay?
tiana tazongan 'nay?
tazungan ay qaqa ku aizipna.
tazongan ay qaqa ko aizipna.
tiana sunis 'nay?
tiana sonis 'nay?
Runanay ay suani ku aizipna.
Ronanay ay soani ko aizipna.
niana qakelawkawayan na tina su?
niana qakelawkawayan na tina so?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: hitay aizipna.
hitay aizipna.
niana qakelawkawayan na tama su?
niana qakelawkawayan na tama so?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: patudan aizipna.
patodan aizipna.
Runanay ay suani su aizipna ni?
Ronanay ay soani so aizipna ni?
ussa, kaput na suani ku aizipna.
ossa, kapot na soani ko aizipna.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: tazungan ay qaqa su aizipna ni?
tazongan ay qaqa so aizipna ni?
ussa, tazungan ay suani ku aizipna.
ossa, tazongan ay soani ko aizipna.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: kintani qaniyau saleppawan?
kintani qaniyao saleppawan?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: kinlima qaniyau saleppawan.
kinlima qaniyao saleppawan.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: kintani sunis na leppaw numi?
kintani sonis na leppaw nomi?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: kinsepat aimi sunis meniz.
kinsepat aimi sonis meniz.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: kintani suani su?
kintani soani so?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: mai iku tu Runanay ay suani, yau kintulu tazungan ay suani ku.
mai iko to Ronanay ay soani, yao kintolo tazongan ay soani ko.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: kintani qaqa su?
kintani qaqa so?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: mai iku tu qaqa.
mai iko to qaqa.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: kintani imu mesasuani?
kintani imo mesasoani?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: mai iku tu mesasuani.
mai iko to mesasoani.
nansani aimu ni?
nansani aimo ni?
en, qaqa ku aizipna.
en, qaqa ko aizipna.
yencumin aimu ni?
yencomin aimo ni?
en, yencumin aimi.
en, yencomin aimi.
kebalan aizipna qaya ni?
kebalan aizipna qaya ni?
en, kebalan aizipna qaya.
en, kebalan aizipna qaya.
naqunian su matiw sa papay?
naqonian so matiw sa papay?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: pasaqay iku tu qitun matiw sa papay.
pasaqay iko to qiton matiw sa papay.
naqunian su matiw ta sapaisingan?
naqonian so matiw ta sapaisingan?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: semaqay iku matiw ta sapaisingan.
semaqay iko matiw ta sapaisingan.
naqunian su matiw sa punghu?
naqonian so matiw sa pongho?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: mezaqis iku tu hikuki matiw sa punghu.
mezaqis iko to hikoki matiw sa pongho.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: naqunian su matiw sa punghu?
naqonian so matiw sa pongho?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: mezaqis iku tu bawa' matiw sa punghu.
mezaqis iko to bawa' matiw sa pongho.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: niana zaqisan su temanan?
niana zaqisan so temanan?
mezaqis iku tu ciyeyun temanan.
mezaqis iko to ciyeyon temanan.
ipay, niana zaqisan su matiw sa taqsian?
ipay, niana zaqisan so matiw sa taqsian?
S.TRANSL: How does ipay go to school?

S.FORM: mezaqis tu gasuling ti ipay matiw sa taqsian.
mezaqis to gasoling ti ipay matiw sa taqsian.
S.TRANSL: ipay goes to school by train.

S.FORM: utay, niana zaqisan su matiw sa kiyukay?
otay, niana zaqisan so matiw sa kiyokay?
S.TRANSL: How does utay go to church?

S.FORM: qazitinsia ti utay matiw sa kiyukay.
qazitinsia ti otay matiw sa kiyokay.
S.TRANSL: utay goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: mezaqis isu tu ciyeyun temaqsi ni?
mezaqis iso to ciyeyon temaqsi ni?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: ussa, mezaqis iku tu basu temaqsi.
ossa, mezaqis iko to baso temaqsi.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: qazitinsia isu temaqsi ni?
qazitinsia iso temaqsi ni?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: en, qazitinsia iku temaqsi.
en, qazitinsia iko temaqsi.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: mezaqis isu tu kawtiye matiw sa kawsiyung ni?
mezaqis iso to kawtiye matiw sa kawsiyong ni?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: en, mezaqis iku tu kawtiye matiw sa kawsiyung.
en, mezaqis iko to kawtiye matiw sa kawsiyong.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: matiw isu sa taitung mezaqis isu tu gasuling uu hikuki?
matiw iso sa taitong mezaqis iso to gasoling oo hikoki?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: mezaqis iku tu hikuki, mezaqis tu hikuki meqasiRma tu gasuling.
mezaqis iko to hikoki, mezaqis to hikoki meqasiRma to gasoling.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: matiw isu sa kiyukay mezaqis tu basu uu pasaqay tu qitun?
matiw iso sa kiyokay mezaqis to baso oo pasaqay to qiton?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: pasaqay iku tu qitun matiw sa kiyukay, pasaqay tu qitun simunangma tu mezaqis tu basu.
pasaqay iko to qiton matiw sa kiyokay, pasaqay to qiton simonangma to mezaqis to baso.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: mezaki tu leppaw numi ya cawse ni?
mezaki to leppaw nomi ya cawse ni?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: mai mezaki, qautubay iku matiw sa cawse.
mai mezaki, qaotobay iko matiw sa cawse.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: yubin seRay taqsian mezaki ni?
yobin seRay taqsian mezaki ni?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: mezaki, semaqay maseq ti.
mezaki, semaqay maseq ti.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: qizuanan qeman mezaki tu teqezan na qitun ni?
qizoanan qeman mezaki to teqezan na qiton ni?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: melusit ta teqezan na qitun semaqay tu ulima tunek na duki maseq ti.
melosit ta teqezan na qiton semaqay to olima tonek na doki maseq ti.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: yau lawad su setangi ni?
yao lawad so setangi ni?
yau lanas ni?
yao lanas ni?
ngid iku qatiw laut timaisuan.
ngid iko qatiw laot timaisoan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: yau lanas ku setang, muman deddan pa.
yao lanas ko setang, moman deddan pa.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家，改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: u qayau lawad su temawaR ni? qemadanan qatiw iku kilim timaisuan.
o qayao lawad so temawaR ni? qemadanan qatiw iko kilim timaisoan.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: nengi ti, palana ka isu ta leppawan.
nengi ti, palana ka iso ta leppawan.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: ngid iku pasanu qanengi iku luin ni? ngid iku sangi tu sasudadan.
ngid iko pasano qanengi iko loin ni? ngid iko sangi to sasodadan.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: kua ya! qanengi ti.
koa ya! qanengi ti.
qanengi iku meningu ni?
qanengi iko meningo ni?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: sukaw iku taytan, mai ni nimen ya siR qaya, naRin yu.
sokaw iko taytan, mai ni nimen ya siR qaya, naRin yo.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: pasiasing a ka nengi ti.
pasiasing a ka nengi ti.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: naRin pasiasing qaya.
naRin pasiasing qaya.
wanay timaisuan semulul timaikuan pasanu.
wanay timaisoan semolol timaikoan pasano.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: mai tu niana, niana ngidan su sanu?
mai to niana, niana ngidan so sano?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: ngid iku pasanu sining pama nani qemuni ay aisu?
ngid iko pasano sining pama nani qemoni ay aiso?
S.TRANSL: 我想請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: masang nani tayzin aiku, wanayka tangi semanga ti iku.
masang nani tayzin aiko, wanayka tangi semanga ti iko.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: yau qakelawkawayan su setangi ni?
yao qakelawkawayan so setangi ni?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: yau iku ta taqsian kelawkaway.
yao iko ta taqsian kelawkaway.
pasanu timaisuan yau ta damuan qemizuan sunis su qaya ni?
pasano timaisoan yao ta damoan qemizoan sonis so qaya ni?
S.TRANSL: 請問您你孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: mai, niz ti yau ta tukayan qemizuan sunis ku.
mai, niz ti yao ta tokayan qemizoan sonis ko.
S.TRANSL: 沒有，我的孩子在都市居住了。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: paqenanem isu qemizuan ni?
paqenanem iso qemizoan ni?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: yau pama niquduan ku tu ussiq wasu seRay ussiq adam, pinileppaw ku qaniyau qaya.
yao pama niqodoan ko to ossiq waso seRay ossiq adam, pinileppaw ko qaniyao qaya.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: yau niquduan ku tu ussiq saku qaya, yau qenuduan sikaput mai ti qanaquni.
yao niqodoan ko to ossiq sako qaya, yao qenodoan sikapot mai ti qanaqoni.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: ngid iku pasanu timaisuan tu pelisin na semalaw.
ngid iko pasano timaisoan to pelisin na semalaw.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: mai muwaza qenasuppaR ku, wanayka yau qenasuppaR ku nizan ku ti isu semanu.
mai mowaza qenasoppaR ko, wanayka yao qenasoppaR ko nizan ko ti iso semano.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Ribang na sasalawan numi yau niana pelisin na ni?
Ribang na sasalawan nomi yao niana pelisin na ni?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Ribang na sasalawan niaq sukaw temingiw ya tazungan.
Ribang na sasalawan niaq sokaw temingiw ya tazongan.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: qanengi masulun matiw semalaw ya tazungan ni?
qanengi masolon matiw semalaw ya tazongan ni?
S.TRANSL: 女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: qasukaw, tazungan qasukaw matiw semalaw qaya.
qasokaw, tazongan qasokaw matiw semalaw qaya.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: setangi tud pa iku tu nangan na pasan.
setangi tod pa iko to nangan na pasan.
S.TRANSL: 今天我要教大家動物的名稱。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Kebalan language today.

S.FORM: setangi tud pa iku tu nangan na kelubasan.
setangi tod pa iko to nangan na kelobasan.
S.TRANSL: 今天我要教大家植物的名稱。

S.FORM: setangi tud pa iku tu nangan na suyqu.
setangi tod pa iko to nangan na soyqo.
S.TRANSL: 今天我要教大家水果的名稱。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Kebalan language today.

S.FORM: naRin maynep!
naRin maynep!
naRin sikawma!
naRin sikawma!
naRin qeman!
naRin qeman!
pazukat ika sudad su!
pazokat ika sodad so!
pazukat ika bilu su!
pazokat ika bilo so!
pazukat ika sasudadan su!
pazokat ika sasodadan so!
nimen ika sudad!
nimen ika sodad!
nimen ika bilu!
nimen ika bilo!
nimen ika qaqanan!
nimen ika qaqanan!
nimen ika qawRatan!
nimen ika qawRatan!
zani tiana ay bilu zau?
zani tiana ay bilo zao?
zaku ay.
zako ay.
zani tiana ay sudad zau?
zani tiana ay sodad zao?
zani angaw ay.
zani angaw ay.
zani tiana ay sasupasan zau?
zani tiana ay sasopasan zao?
Raynguan ku.
Rayngoan ko.
qudus 'nay, zani angaw ay?
qodos 'nay, zani angaw ay?
ussa, zani api ay gaytu zau.
ossa, zani api ay gayto zao.
patudan, mai iku mazas tu sudad.
patodan, mai iko mazas to sodad.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: qasulun ika ta kinilan ay kaput temayta.
qasolon ika ta kinilan ay kapot temayta.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: maRiqet ti bilu ku.
maRiqet ti bilo ko.
iyung ka tu yencepi semudad!
iyong ka to yencepi semodad!
meqamai ti sasupasan ku.
meqamai ti sasopasan ko.
paliway aka aisu tu sasupasan ku.
paliway aka aiso to sasopasan ko.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: sanga pa ita ti temaqsi, temanan nani, satawaR ka yu!
sanga pa ita ti temaqsi, temanan nani, satawaR ka yo!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: kua, wanay patudan.
koa, wanay patodan.
sanga pa ita ti temaqsi, wanay.
sanga pa ita ti temaqsi, wanay.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: wanay patudan.
wanay patodan.
nengi ita, ti abang nangan ku.
nengi ita, ti abang nangan ko.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is abang.

S.FORM: abang, nengi isu.
abang, nengi iso.
nengi ita, ti buya nangan ku.
nengi ita, ti boya nangan ko.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is buya.

S.FORM: buya, nengi isu.
boya, nengi iso.
nengi isu, ti abang aiku.
nengi iso, ti abang aiko.
abang, nengi isu, ti angaw aiku.
abang, nengi iso, ti angaw aiko.
nengi isu, ti buya aiku.
nengi iso, ti boya aiko.
buya, nengi isu, ti angaw aiku.
boya, nengi iso, ti angaw aiko.
tiana aisu?
tiana aiso?
tina ni bawki aiku, ti umus aiku.
tina ni bawki aiko, ti omos aiko.
tiana aisu?
tiana aiso?
suani ni bawki aiku, ti abas aiku.
soani ni bawki aiko, ti abas aiko.
S.TRANSL: 我是bawki的妹妹，我的名字是abas。
I am bawki’s sister. My name is abas.

S.FORM: tiana aizipna?
tiana aizipna?
patudan ku aizipna, ti hulam nangan na.
patodan ko aizipna, ti holam nangan na.
S.TRANSL: 他是我的老師，他的名字叫作hulam。

S.FORM: tiana lazat 'nay?
tiana lazat 'nay?
qaqa ku aizipna, ti kudaw aizipna.
qaqa ko aizipna, ti kodaw aizipna.
ti abang aizipna?
ti abang aizipna?
an, ti abang aizipna.
an, ti abang aizipna.
ti abang aisu?
ti abang aiso?
ussa, ti angaw aiku.
ossa, ti angaw aiko.
tiana ti abang?
tiana ti abang?
aiku.
aiko.
tiana ti angaw?
tiana ti angaw?
kaput ku ti angaw.
kapot ko ti angaw.
tiana nangan na qaqa su?
tiana nangan na qaqa so?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: ti abas nangan na qaqa ku.
ti abas nangan na qaqa ko.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is abas.

S.FORM: tiana nangan na suani su?
tiana nangan na soani so?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: ti pipis nangan na suani ku.
ti pipis nangan na soani ko.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is pipis.

S.FORM: suppaRan su ti tiana nangan na?
soppaRan so ti tiana nangan na?
ti abang aizipna.
ti abang aizipna.
utani ti tasaw na qaqa su setangi?
otani ti tasaw na qaqa so setangi?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: Rabetin ti yau ulima tasaw na setangi.
Rabetin ti yao olima tasaw na setangi.
utani ti tasaw na suani su setangi?
otani ti tasaw na soani so setangi?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: ulima ti tasaw na setangi.
olima ti tasaw na setangi.
yau taqsian ta damuan numi?
yao taqsian ta damoan nomi?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: yau.
yao.
temaqsi isu ta damuan ay taqsian?
temaqsi iso ta damoan ay taqsian?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎？
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: en, azu saleppawan aimi temaqsi ta taqsian.
en, azo saleppawan aimi temaqsi ta taqsian.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: naquni deddan tangi?
naqoni deddan tangi?
sessen tu kiya deddan zau, qawaza ka menanum tu mammaq ay.
sessen to kiya deddan zao, qawaza ka menanom to mammaq ay.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: naquni deddan tangi?
naqoni deddan tangi?
mammaq tu kiya deddan zau, qaduna ka menanum.
mammaq to kiya deddan zao, qadona ka menanom.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: naquni deddan tangi ta tati?
naqoni deddan tangi ta tati?
Raya sezang, paqangi ika lubung su mangay maqaRat ti.
Raya sezang, paqangi ika lobong so mangay maqaRat ti.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: naquni deddan tangi ta tati?
naqoni deddan tangi ta tati?
muwaza lanem, mai mezukat ya sezang ta deddanan.
mowaza lanem, mai mezokat ya sezang ta deddanan.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: qanaquni deddan antemawaR?
qanaqoni deddan antemawaR?
qamai tu sezang temawaR, qawaza lanem, qaRaya bali.
qamai to sezang temawaR, qawaza lanem, qaRaya bali.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: qanaquni deddan 'nay?
qanaqoni deddan 'nay?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: qasessen pa deddan 'nay, sigaytu ka lusit.
qasessen pa deddan 'nay, sigayto ka losit.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: qanaquni deddan 'nay ta hibangan?
qanaqoni deddan 'nay ta hibangan?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: sumzang qasimunang deddan 'nay ta hibangan.
somzang qasimonang deddan 'nay ta hibangan.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: qauzan pa deddan 'nay?
qaozan pa deddan 'nay?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: sumzang deddan 'nay, Rayngu muzan.
somzang deddan 'nay, Rayngo mozan.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: qauzan pa deddan 'nay?
qaozan pa deddan 'nay?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: en, qauzan pa deddan 'nay.
en, qaozan pa deddan 'nay.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: yau muzan tangi?
yao mozan tangi?
muReti ti, mezukat ti sezang.
moReti ti, mezokat ti sezang.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: yau muzan tangi?
yao mozan tangi?
muzan ti, mai iku siqawsua.
mozan ti, mai iko siqawsoa.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: yau muzan ta tati?
yao mozan ta tati?
mai muzan setangi, qemadanan qauzan pa, siqawsua ka lusit.
mai mozan setangi, qemadanan qaozan pa, siqawsoa ka losit.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: qasessen pa kezumai lezun?
qasessen pa kezomai lezon?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: en, qasessen pa kezumai lezun, qawaza ka siqudus.
en, qasessen pa kezomai lezon, qawaza ka siqodos.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: qamammaq pa sekawalu na tasaw zau?
qamammaq pa sekawalo na tasaw zao?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: en, qamammaq pa sekawalu, qaduna ka menanum.
en, qamammaq pa sekawalo, qadona ka menanom.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: melizaq isu tu samulayan?
melizaq iso to samolayan?
melizaq iku tu samulayan, sanangan qenamammaq na.
melizaq iko to samolayan, sanangan qenamammaq na.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: melizaq isu tu semiaRaR?
melizaq iso to semiaRaR?
mai iku melizaq tu semiaRaR, muwaza banged.
mai iko melizaq to semiaRaR, mowaza banged.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: mekalingun ti iku mazas tu sudad.
mekalingon ti iko mazas to sodad.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: qasulun pa ita temayta.
qasolon pa ita temayta.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: mekalingun ti iku mazas tu sasupasan.
mekalingon ti iko mazas to sasopasan.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: paliway aka aisu tu zaku.
paliway aka aiso to zako.
mekalingun ti isu mazas tu bilu?
mekalingon ti iso mazas to bilo?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: en, paliway iku tu bilu su si?
en, paliway iko to bilo so si?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: niana ngidan su qan satutu?
niana ngidan so qan satoto?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: ngid iku qan tu minpaw.
ngid iko qan to minpaw.
niana ngidan su qan saRabi?
niana ngidan so qan saRabi?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: ngid iku qan tu 'may.
ngid iko qan to 'may.
niana qanan su sataRbabi?
niana qanan so sataRbabi?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: qeman ti iku tu tiRuR.
qeman ti iko to tiRoR.
niana qanan su satutu?
niana qanan so satoto?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: qeman ti iku tu 'si na taquq.
qeman ti iko to 'si na taqoq.
sipsipiq pa ita tu mali.
sipsipiq pa ita to mali.
kunna isu qatiw, antangi ti iku kemilim timaisu.
konna iso qatiw, antangi ti iko kemilim timaiso.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: nanguy pa ita.
nangoy pa ita.
kua ya! qatiw pa ita.
koa ya! qatiw pa ita.
qawRat pa ita tu mali.
qawRat pa ita to mali.
naRin, kunna pa ita temalin tu sudad.
naRin, konna pa ita temalin to sodad.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: qemuRu ti isu tu bangRaw su?
qemoRo ti iso to bangRaw so?
mai pama, yau iku melinaw tu kaysing.
mai pama, yao iko melinaw to kaysing.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: qemumuR ti isu?
qemomoR ti iso?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: qemumuR ti iku.
qemomoR ti iko.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: melinaw ti isu tu kaysing?
melinaw ti iso to kaysing?
pun ti iku melinaw tu kaysing.
pon ti iko melinaw to kaysing.
manna mai isu banaw tu lima?
manna mai iso banaw to lima?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: antangi iku banaw.
antangi iko banaw.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: qemuni isu tangi?
qemoni iso tangi?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: matiw iku kemilim tu patudan.
matiw iko kemilim to patodan.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: antangi semanga ti temaqsi, quni pa isu?
antangi semanga ti temaqsi, qoni pa iso?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: qatuRiyas iku tanan.
qatoRiyas iko tanan.
antangi semanga ti temaqsi nani, quni pa aizipna?
antangi semanga ti temaqsi nani, qoni pa aizipna?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: salekiaw pa aizipna.
salekiaw pa aizipna.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: api, yau isu ta leppawan?
api, yao iso ta leppawan?
yau, tuqaz ka!
yao, toqaz ka!
api, yau isu ta leppawan?
api, yao iso ta leppawan?
mai ta leppawan ti api! ti ipay aiku, yau lanas ni? antangi temanan ti ti api si, sanu aka.
mai ta leppawan ti api! ti ipay aiko, yao lanas ni? antangi temanan ti ti api si, sano aka.
S.TRANSL: api不在家耶！我是ipay，有什麼事嗎？回來我會轉告api。
api is not at home. I am ipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: tiana aimu?
tiana aimo?
bai, ti abas seRay ti api aimi, tangan ika ineb!
bai, ti abas seRay ti api aimi, tangan ika ineb!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是abas和api，幫我們開門！
Grandma, we are abas and api, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: tiana ya?
tiana ya?
ti buya aiku, mawtu iku kemilim ti utayan.
ti boya aiko, mawto iko kemilim ti otayan.
S.TRANSL: I am buya, I am here for utayan.

S.FORM: bai, mawtu iku melaut timaisu.
bai, mawto iko melaot timaiso.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: tennes ti isu mai mawtu, sizenges iku timaisu.
tennes ti iso mai mawto, sizenges iko timaiso.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: api, mawtu iku kemilim timaisu mawRawRat.
api, mawto iko kemilim timaiso mawRawRat.
S.TRANSL: api, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: tuqaz ka! tennes ti iku melana timaisu.
toqaz ka! tennes ti iko melana timaiso.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: qawpiR zau nipaluman ku, tadam ika si!
qawpiR zao nipaloman ko, tadam ika si!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看！
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: datebus qawpiR zau.
datebos qawpiR zao.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: awRi! suykuo zau nipaluman ku, tadam ika si!
awRi! soykoo zao nipaloman ko, tadam ika si!
S.TRANSL: 過來！這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: datebus suykuo zau.
datebos soykoo zao.
qadded ka! mais zau nipaluman ku, mai puiyuan ay, tadam ika si!
qadded ka! mais zao nipaloman ko, mai poiyoan ay, tadam ika si!
S.TRANSL: 請坐！這是我種的有機玉米吃看看！
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: aw! datebus mais zau.
aw! datebos mais zao.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: qan pa isu tu mulu?
qan pa iso to molo?
Rayngu iku qan tu mulu, nengi ti qeman iku tu linggu.
Rayngo iko qan to molo, nengi ti qeman iko to linggo.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: qan pa isu tu piyang?
qan pa iso to piyang?
kua, melizaq iku.
koa, melizaq iko.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: teRis pa iku tu suykuo paqan timaisu.
teRis pa iko to soykoo paqan timaiso.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: wanay, muwaza salang na suykuo zau.
wanay, mowaza salang na soykoo zao.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: ala aka zanum sananuman su.
ala aka zanom sananoman so.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: wanay.
wanay.
qawaza ika qeman, muwaza niRamazan ku tu tamun.
qawaza ika qeman, mowaza niRamazan ko to tamon.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: aw! maken! bangsis, nengi qanan!
aw! maken! bangsis, nengi qanan!
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: qawaza ika qeman, yau pama muwaza tazian.
qawaza ika qeman, yao pama mowaza tazian.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: kua, wanay!
koa, wanay!
qawaza ika qeman, yau pama muwaza tazian.
qawaza ika qeman, yao pama mowaza tazian.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: muwaza ti niqanan ku, bisuR ti iku.
mowaza ti niqanan ko, bisoR ti iko.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: azas aka aimu qatiw sa naung.
azas aka aimo qatiw sa naong.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: "yau muwaza Ris ta naungan." zin na tina ku.
"yao mowaza Ris ta naongan." zin na tina ko.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: azas aka aimu qatiw sa bawbi.
azas aka aimo qatiw sa bawbi.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: saqawang pa ita?
saqawang pa ita?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: pasani pa ita setangi?
pasani pa ita setangi?
azasan na pa ita na patudan qatiw sa iRuR.
azasan na pa ita na patodan qatiw sa iRoR.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: pasani pa ita setangi?
pasani pa ita setangi?
azasan na pa ita na patudan qatiw sa naung.
azasan na pa ita na patodan qatiw sa naong.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: setangi qatiw pa ita sa iRuR?
setangi qatiw pa ita sa iRoR?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: ussa, azasan na pa ita na patudan qatiw sa naung.
ossa, azasan na pa ita na patodan qatiw sa naong.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: setangi qatiw pa ita sa naung?
setangi qatiw pa ita sa naong?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: ussa, qatiw pa ita sa bawbi.
ossa, qatiw pa ita sa bawbi.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: patudan, niana sataytan ta ta iRuRan?
patodan, niana sataytan ta ta iRoRan?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼？
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: tayta pa ita tu putit.
tayta pa ita to potit.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: patudan, niana sataytan ta ta naungan?
patodan, niana sataytan ta ta naongan?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼？
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: tayta pa ita tu pulaw.
tayta pa ita to polaw.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: quni pa ita ta bawbian?
qoni pa ita ta bawbian?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: tayta pa ita tu mais nipaluman ta ta bawbian, satawaR ka tu luzem seRay pennay yu!
tayta pa ita to mais nipaloman ta ta bawbian, satawaR ka to lozem seRay pennay yo!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷！
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: patudan, qatiw pa ita ta iRuRan menanguy?
patodan, qatiw pa ita ta iRoRan menangoy?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎？
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: ussa, tayta pa ita tu putit.
ossa, tayta pa ita to potit.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: patudan, qatiw pa ita ta bawbian meluma tu tenned?
patodan, qatiw pa ita ta bawbian meloma to tenned?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎？
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: setangi saqawang pa ita.
setangi saqawang pa ita.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: yau putit temanbabaseR tayan.
yao potit temanbabaseR tayan.
temuzus tu tangi qawka iku meqayta tu binnus ay putit.
temozos to tangi qawka iko meqayta to binnos ay potit.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: yau pulaw temanbabaseR tayan.
yao polaw temanbabaseR tayan.
wa! melizaq iku tu pulaw, simqena.
wa! melizaq iko to polaw, simqena.
S.TRANSL: 耶！哇！我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: yau pulaw temanbabaseR tayan.
yao polaw temanbabaseR tayan.
ussa pulaw 'nay, pennay 'nay.
ossa polaw 'nay, pennay 'nay.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: tazian ka temayta, naRin medaud!
tazian ka temayta, naRin medaod!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷！
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: 'ma ti, Rayngu imi medaud.
'ma ti, Rayngo imi medaod.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: naRin meRaRiw, qanas ka semaqay mangay mesuRaw.
naRin meRaRiw, qanas ka semaqay mangay mesoRaw.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: ngid iku qalazuk meqayta.
ngid iko qalazok meqayta.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: bawki, mai ti tu Raq ta, Rasa ka!
bawki, mai ti to Raq ta, Rasa ka!
S.TRANSL: bawki，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
bawki, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: yau pama ussiq ta sammayan, Raypa ti meRasa!
yao pama ossiq ta sammayan, Raypa ti meRasa!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧！
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: ussiq ma mai semin, Rasa ka tu uzusa!
ossiq ma mai semin, Rasa ka to ozosa!
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Rasa pa iku tu Raq, yau baliwan numi?
Rasa pa iko to Raq, yao baliwan nomi?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎？
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: yau! utani ngidan su?
yao! otani ngidan so?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: ngid iku Rasa tu uzusa peRaskuan Raq seRay satabuan beRas.
ngid iko Rasa to ozosa peRaskoan Raq seRay sataboan beRas.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: tazian ya beRas, yau pama niana ngidan su?
tazian ya beRas, yao pama niana ngidan so?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎？
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Rasa pa iku tu tiRuR, yau pama?
Rasa pa iko to tiRoR, yao pama?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: mai ti tiRuR niaq.
mai ti tiRoR niaq.
Rasa pa iku tu qudus.
Rasa pa iko to qodos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: naquni ay ngidan su?
naqoni ay ngidan so?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: ngid iku Rasa tu kezut tusungan ay qudus.
ngid iko Rasa to kezot tosongan ay qodos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: tebaRi ay zau, naquni zin su?
tebaRi ay zao, naqoni zin so?
yau zuma ay tamak?
yao zoma ay tamak?
yau pama busaR ay seRay deddan puli ay.
yao pama bosaR ay seRay deddan poli ay.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: bula iku tu ussiq deddan puli ay qudus.
bola iko to ossiq deddan poli ay qodos.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: bawki, matiw isu seni? matiw isu mundu?
bawki, matiw iso seni? matiw iso mondo?
S.TRANSL: bawki你剛剛去哪裡了？你去運動嗎？
bawki, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: ussa, manmu iku tu bai meRasa tu tenned.
ossa, manmo iko to bai meRasa to tenned.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: nazau si, anqaRabi yau lawad su? qasulun pa ita qan saRabi.
nazao si, anqaRabi yao lawad so? qasolon pa ita qan saRabi.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空？要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Rayngu iku, Rasa pa iku tu qudus.
Rayngo iko, Rasa pa iko to qodos.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: qasulun aka aisu qatiw.
qasolon aka aiso qatiw.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: nengi isu, saputen tenned zau, utani asa na?
nengi iso, sapoten tenned zao, otani asa na?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢？
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: saputen tenned, uzusa betin asa na.
sapoten tenned, ozosa betin asa na.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: utani asa na qawpiR zau?
otani asa na qawpiR zao?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: salaluyan qawpiR, utulu betin asa na.
salaloyan qawpiR, otolo betin asa na.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: bula iku tu uzusa putenan tenned zau seRay salaluyan qawpiR.
bola iko to ozosa potenan tenned zao seRay salaloyan qawpiR.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: bawki, mekalingun ti iku mazas tu bilu, qanengi isu paliway timaiku?
bawki, mekalingon ti iko mazas to bilo, qanengi iso paliway timaiko?
S.TRANSL: bawki，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎？
bawki, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: mai iku qaya, zani api ay zau.
mai iko qaya, zani api ay zao.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is api’s.

S.FORM: nayau si, qanengi paliway timaiku? kikiya ma, antangi patadikudan ku ti.
nayao si, qanengi paliway timaiko? kikiya ma, antangi patadikodan ko ti.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎？我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: kua! ala ika!
koa! ala ika!
wanay, paqayaw iku qaya muwanay ti apian.
wanay, paqayaw iko qaya mowanay ti apian.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank apian for me.

S.FORM: niana ngidan su?
niana ngidan so?
ngid iku patadikud tu uzusa sudad zau.
ngid iko patadikod to ozosa sodad zao.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: kua, yau pama niana ngidan su?
koa, yao pama niana ngidan so?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: liway pa iku tu utulu sudad zau.
liway pa iko to otolo sodad zao.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: pun ti. utulu ti deddanan, patadikud ika!
pon ti. otolo ti deddanan, patadikod ika!
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還！
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: mai pama isu patadikud tu sasupasan ku.
mai pama iso patadikod to sasopasan ko.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: patadikudan ku ti siRab.
patadikodan ko ti siRab.
nazau si, manna meqamai ti sasupasan ku?
nazao si, manna meqamai ti sasopasan ko?
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了？
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: ussa paliwayan su ti ti bawkian?
ossa paliwayan so ti ti bawkian?
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to bawki?

S.FORM: itta! ipil aka aizipna si!
itta! ipil aka aizipna si!
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: paliway aka sasupasan ku timaisu.
paliway aka sasopasan ko timaiso.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: api, nipaliwayan ni bawki timaisu gaytu zau?
api, nipaliwayan ni bawki timaiso gayto zao?
S.TRANSL: api, did bawki lend you this coat?

S.FORM: ussa, niRasan na tina ku zau.
ossa, niRasan na tina ko zao.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: sasetaR tu zasu gaytu ni bawki.
sasetaR to zaso gayto ni bawki.
S.TRANSL: bawki’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: tengen ay gaytu na, mai sasetaR tamak niaq.
tengen ay gayto na, mai sasetaR tamak niaq.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: api, umeliway isu tu kelisiw ni bawki?
api, omeliway iso to kelisiw ni bawki?
S.TRANSL: api, did you borrow money from bawki?

S.FORM: yau, maw mengid iku patadikud timaizipana, wanayka mekalingun ti iku mazas tu kelisiw.
yao, maw mengid iko patadikod timaizipana, wanayka mekalingon ti iko mazas to kelisiw.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: nayau si, qumni isu patadikud?
nayao si, qomni iso patadikod?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: temawaR patadikud aka timaizipana.
temawaR patadikod aka timaizipana.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: kua, paqayaw aka aisu semanu ti bawkian.
koa, paqayaw aka aiso semano ti bawkian.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell bawki for you.

S.FORM: mutun nani, medaiyung tu pemattu ay tikas. tiquRis nani, medaiyung tu tiwa tikas. nazau qawka.
moton nani, medaiyong to pematto ay tikas. tiqoRis nani, medaiyong to tiwa tikas. nazao qawka.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要石壓式陷阱抓，竹雞應該要套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: nazau? melisaw ti iku! saquni mai tu niqapaRan ku.
nazao? melisaw ti iko! saqoni mai to niqapaRan ko.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣？我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: nayau si, tud aka aisu naqunian ta semangi tu nazau ay uzusa tikas.
nayao si, tod aka aiso naqonian ta semangi to nazao ay ozosa tikas.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: u! nengi! qusazui qayau pa ti qapaRan ku.
o! nengi! qosazoi qayao pa ti qapaRan ko.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: qummut ti suway na bawbi, ala ika sawki ta sukuan, qatiw pa ita sa bawbi.
qommot ti soway na bawbi, ala ika sawki ta sokoan, qatiw pa ita sa bawbi.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: pizian su tanian ya sawki?
pizian so tanian ya sawki?
ta kinilan na benuqu, semuRem ti isu ta sukuan nani, qaqayta su ti.
ta kinilan na benoqo, semoRem ti iso ta sokoan nani, qaqayta so ti.
S.TRANSL: 在穀物乾燥簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: mangan sawki 'nay, satawaR ka mala mangay meluzit!
mangan sawki 'nay, satawaR ka mala mangay melozit!
S.TRANSL: 鐮刀很利，小心拿以免受傷！
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: naRin tebeRan tikas ku!
naRin tebeRan tikas ko!
tanian tikas su?
tanian tikas so?
yau ta libeng na paRin 'nay tikas ku.
yao ta libeng na paRin 'nay tikas ko.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: manna suppaRan su?
manna soppaRan so?
yau nikisasan ku tazian, Raqana suppaRan ku tanian tikas ku.
yao nikisasan ko tazian, Raqana soppaRan ko tanian tikas ko.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: sangku zau, sepawan ta ta iRuRan Raybaut.
sangko zao, sepawan ta ta iRoRan Raybaot.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: mai tu sangku tamaimian, nizu melawis tu baut.
mai to sangko tamaimian, nizo melawis to baot.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: mai iku mudaiyung tu paniwsan, antemawaR si, tud iku?
mai iko modaiyong to paniwsan, antemawaR si, tod iko?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎？
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: kua! antemawaR qasulun pa ita melawis.
koa! antemawaR qasolon pa ita melawis.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: anu nayau si, tud aka aisu naqunian ta semangi tu sangku.
ano nayao si, tod aka aiso naqonian ta semangi to sangko.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: temingiw ti paniwsan su, pasi mala ti tu baut! qalazuk ka misis!
temingiw ti paniwsan so, pasi mala ti to baot! qalazok ka misis!
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了！你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: antangi ti, suzingzingay ya bawa'. tazian iku misis tu paniwsan, ala ka tu suRuq tayan.
antangi ti, sozingzingay ya bawa'. tazian iko misis to paniwsan, ala ka to soRoq tayan.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: tebes ika pasazi, panmu aka misis.
tebes ika pasazi, panmo aka misis.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊，我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: nengi! muwaza nialan ta tangi, puniR ti bakal ta meniz.
nengi! mowaza nialan ta tangi, poniR ti bakal ta meniz.
S.TRANSL: 太好了！今天大豐收，藤籃都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: qalazuk pa ita tanan sinapun tu Raqit.
qalazok pa ita tanan sinapon to Raqit.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: mawtu ti patudan.
mawto ti patodan.
naRin ti mawRat, qalazuk ka madded ta qaddedan.
naRin ti mawRat, qalazok ka madded ta qaddedan.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: qasikazan, tangzasan ti iku!
qasikazan, tangzasan ti iko!
qalazuk ka temuqaz.
qalazok ka temoqaz.
lipayan na utani setangi?
lipayan na otani setangi?
saqalima lipay setangi, hibang temawaR, qasulun lusit saqsaqay temawaR!
saqalima lipay setangi, hibang temawaR, qasolon losit saqsaqay temawaR!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: kuwaya! qatiw pa ita sa iRuR.
kowaya! qatiw pa ita sa iRoR.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: lipayan na utani temawaR?
lipayan na otani temawaR?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: saqatulu lipay temawaR, temawaR qemadanan qatiw pa ita qawRat tu mali!
saqatolo lipay temawaR, temawaR qemadanan qatiw pa ita qawRat to mali!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: quni pa isu temawaR taRbabi?
qoni pa iso temawaR taRbabi?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: temawaR nani melipay, qasulun pa iku tu tina matiw sa kiyukay.
temawaR nani melipay, qasolon pa iko to tina matiw sa kiyokay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: manna ti isu?
manna ti iso?
ngid iku uti, qatiw pa iku sa siatisinan.
ngid iko oti, qatiw pa iko sa siatisinan.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: lubingaw uRu ku.
lobingaw oRo ko.
suqebqeb ka hibang aisu.
soqebqeb ka hibang aiso.
patudan, taRaw bedes ku, qatiw sa siatisinan.
patodan, taRaw bedes ko, qatiw sa siatisinan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: kuwa, qalazuk ka matiw.
kowa, qalazok ka matiw.
qanengi iku matiw banaw tu lima ni?
qanengi iko matiw banaw to lima ni?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: qangid ti hibang temaqsi, antangi qawka matiw.
qangid ti hibang temaqsi, antangi qawka matiw.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: patudan, taRaw uRu ku, ngid hibang qemadanan.
patodan, taRaw oRo ko, ngid hibang qemadanan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: kuwa, satawaR ka temanan.
kowa, satawaR ka temanan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: patudan muman saqaussiq lipay hibang pa iku, ngid iku paqayta tu ising.
patodan moman saqaossiq lipay hibang pa iko, ngid iko paqayta to ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: kuwa, qanengi ika ya izip.
kowa, qanengi ika ya izip.
yau tanian ti abas?
yao tanian ti abas?
taRaw bedes na, yau ta siatisinan.
taRaw bedes na, yao ta siatisinan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: yau tanian ti utay?
yao tanian ti otay?
patudan, taRaw qeluqung ni utay, hibang setangi.
patodan, taRaw qeloqong ni otay, hibang setangi.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, utay has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: manna mai mawtu ti abas?
manna mai mawto ti abas?
maRemaq ti aizipna.
maRemaq ti aizipna.
sanu ka tu tiana iku.
sano ka to tiana iko.
ti utay nalis aiku, Rabetin ti tasaw ku setangi.
ti otay nalis aiko, Rabetin ti tasaw ko setangi.
S.TRANSL: My name is Utay nalis, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: tiana nangan su?
tiana nangan so?
ti utay nalis nangan ku.
ti otay nalis nangan ko.
sunis na niana cu ay aisu?
sonis na niana co ay aiso?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: sunis na kebalan aiku.
sonis na kebalan aiko.
nizu yencumin saleppawan su ni?
nizo yencomin saleppawan so ni?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: en, nizu kebalan aimi saleppawan.
en, nizo kebalan aimi saleppawan.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是噶瑪蘭族人。
Yes, my whole family is Kebalan.

S.FORM: nizu yencumin saleppawan su ni?
nizo yencomin saleppawan so ni?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: ussa, kebalan ya tama ku, busus ya tina ku.
ossa, kebalan ya tama ko, bosos ya tina ko.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是噶瑪蘭族，我的媽媽是閩南人。
No, my father is Kebalan, and my mother is Hakien.

S.FORM: tiana sunis aisu?
tiana sonis aiso?
sunis ni buya batu aiku.
sonis ni boya bato aiko.
mayni tama su? utani ti tasaw na?
mayni tama so? otani ti tasaw na?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: unem betin ti tasaw na.
onem betin ti tasaw na.
tama su tiyau ni? utani ti tasaw na?
tama so tiyao ni? otani ti tasaw na?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: ussa, baqian na damu niaq aizipna, uwalu betin ti tasaw na.
ossa, baqian na damo niaq aizipna, owalo betin ti tasaw na.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: utani ti tasaw na qaqa su?
otani ti tasaw na qaqa so?
Rabetin yau uwalu ti tasaw na qaqa ku.
Rabetin yao owalo ti tasaw na qaqa ko.
Raya tu muwaza tasaw na qaqa su timaisuan ni?
Raya to mowaza tasaw na qaqa so timaisoan ni?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: ulima tasaw qenatanaq niaq.
olima tasaw qenatanaq niaq.
utani qenaibabaw su?
otani qenaibabaw so?
Rasibu yau usepat betin qenaibabaw ku.
Rasibo yao osepat betin qenaibabaw ko.
tenes ti ita mai simtayta, ibabaw ti isu muman ni?
tenes ti ita mai simtayta, ibabaw ti iso moman ni?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: en ya, Rasibu yau utulu betin ti qenaibabaw ku.
en ya, Rasibo yao otolo betin ti qenaibabaw ko.
missi ti isu ni?
missi ti iso ni?
mai, melisaw nitayta su.
mai, melisaw nitayta so.
qiwat ti isu ni?
qiwat ti iso ni?
mai, missi ti iku.
mai, missi ti iko.
missi ti isu ni?
missi ti iso ni?
maqezaq, utulu betin ti laluyan aiku setangi.
maqezaq, otolo betin ti laloyan aiko setangi.
qatiw pa isu tanian?
qatiw pa iso tanian?
qatiw pa iku ta qizuanan na patudan kilim tu patudan.
qatiw pa iko ta qizoanan na patodan kilim to patodan.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: qatiw pa tanian ti anu?
qatiw pa tanian ti ano?
qatiw pa baqsiw tu RusRus aizipna.
qatiw pa baqsiw to RosRos aizipna.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: yau tanian ti anu?
yao tanian ti ano?
yau ta nanguyan aizipna, antangi simsuqas pa menanguy aizipna.
yao ta nangoyan aizipna, antangi simsoqas pa menangoy aizipna.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: yau tanian ti api? antangi simsuqas pa meRaRiw aizipna.
yao tanian ti api? antangi simsoqas pa meRaRiw aizipna.
S.TRANSL: Api在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Api? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: yau ta qizuanan na mazeun, qatiwan ku pa qumRas aizipna.
yao ta qizoanan na mazeon, qatiwan ko pa qomRas aizipna.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: qasulun pa ita matiw ta unduqayan ka.
qasolon pa ita matiw ta ondoqayan ka.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: kunna pa iku Rasa tu satuttuan, antangi qatiw kilim timaisuan.
konna pa iko Rasa to satottoan, antangi qatiw kilim timaisoan.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: qasulun pa ita matiw misis tu 'may ka!
qasolon pa ita matiw misis to 'may ka!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: kilim ka tu 'daq aisu, qatiw pa iku kilim tu patudan.
kilim ka to 'daq aiso, qatiw pa iko kilim to patodan.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: setangi simsuqas pa tumkuk tu mali ti anu ni?
setangi simsoqas pa tomkok to mali ti ano ni?
S.TRANSL: Is Anu competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: mai, simsuqas pa tu medutiq aizipna.
mai, simsoqas pa to medotiq aizipna.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: undukay deddan 'nay zukat isu simsuqas ni?
ondokay deddan 'nay zokat iso simsoqas ni?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: qayau, qangid iku simsuqas meRaRiw.
qayao, qangid iko simsoqas meRaRiw.
undukay deddan 'nay qayau isu zukat simsuqas ni?
ondokay deddan 'nay qayao iso zokat simsoqas ni?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: qayau iku simsuqas tumkuk tu mali.
qayao iko simsoqas tomkok to mali.
undukay deddan 'nay quni pa ita?
ondokay deddan 'nay qoni pa ita?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: simsuqas pa ita simtebes tu Rais.
simsoqas pa ita simtebes to Rais.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: undukay ita baliw pa tu qaqanan ni?
ondokay ita baliw pa to qaqanan ni?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: ussa, baliw pa ita tu kikuya.
ossa, baliw pa ita to kikoya.
mala isu tu saqayau ay nangan ye, maken satuRin!
mala iso to saqayao ay nangan ye, maken satoRin!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: wanay.
wanay.
yau ta leppawan ti bai ni?
yao ta leppawan ti bai ni?
yau, yau ta qinpanan maynep aizipna.
yao, yao ta qinpanan maynep aizipna.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: yau ta leppawan ti bai ni?
yao ta leppawan ti bai ni?
mai, Rulusit aizipna, qaRabi qawka tanan.
mai, Rolosit aizipna, qaRabi qawka tanan.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: yau ta leppawan ti baqi ni?
yao ta leppawan ti baqi ni?
yau ta saqazusa maletuttut, tuqaz ka aisu kilim timaizipana.
yao ta saqazosa maletottot, toqaz ka aiso kilim timaizipana.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: yau lazat ta leppawan ni?
yao lazat ta leppawan ni?
ti aki ka, tenes ti mai temayta timaisuan, nengi isu ni?
ti aki ka, tenes ti mai temayta timaisoan, nengi iso ni?
S.TRANSL: 是Aki阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Aki. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: nengi ti yu! mawtu iku kemilim timaisuan sidadak.
nengi ti yo! mawto iko kemilim timaisoan sidadak.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: yau tanian tama su?
yao tanian tama so?
yau ta sammayan maRtik tu tamun, qeRasan ku pa aizipna.
yao ta sammayan maRtik to tamon, qeRasan ko pa aizipna.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: matiw seni ti umus?
matiw seni ti omos?
matiw sa Rupu na taquq aizipna qemapaR tu taquq.
matiw sa Ropo na taqoq aizipna qemapaR to taqoq.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: baqi, mawtu ti imi.
baqi, mawto ti imi.
mai baqi numi ta leppawan, yau ta zennan aizipna, ta leppawan ka aimu melana tu tananan na.
mai baqi nomi ta leppawan, yao ta zennan aizipna, ta leppawan ka aimo melana to tananan na.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: tama mawtu ti isu ka!
tama mawto ti iso ka!
tenes mai simtayta, ibabaw ti isu.
tenes mai simtayta, ibabaw ti iso.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: qalizaqan temayta tu mawtu isu.
qalizaqan temayta to mawto iso.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: sabulan timaimuan unglay zau, seppaw ika ta suRena ay qabtuanan.
sabolan timaimoan onglay zao, seppaw ika ta soRena ay qabtoanan.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: tenes tu nazau mai mawtu, tingaRan ku pa meniz tu qawtuan qeman.
tenes to nazao mai mawto, tingaRan ko pa meniz to qawtoan qeman.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: naRin ti paqelabut, menanum ti iku tu ucia nengi ti, qawtu pa ita sa temunaw sidadak.
naRin ti paqelabot, menanom ti iko to ocia nengi ti, qawto pa ita sa temonaw sidadak.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: wanay tu nipasipen su, tanan pa iku ti.
wanay to nipasipen so, tanan pa iko ti.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Ru'tung taquq zau, azas ika patanan paqanas ika qeman aisu.
Ro'tong taqoq zao, azas ika patanan paqanas ika qeman aiso.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: temawaR qemadanan aiku seRay aisu simtayta nengi ni?
temawaR qemadanan aiko seRay aiso simtayta nengi ni?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: qanengi, tanian pa ita simtayta?
qanengi, tanian pa ita simtayta?
ta taqsian pa ita simtayta nengi ni? paningu pa ita.
ta taqsian pa ita simtayta nengi ni? paningo pa ita.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: nayau qatiw sa siwRatan nengi ti, siqudus pa iku tu qudus na kebalan matiw.
nayao qatiw sa siwRatan nengi ti, siqodos pa iko to qodos na kebalan matiw.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: tepuwaq sakula na damu niaq Rubatang. palana ka tu tepuwaqan qawka isu kemilim timaikuan!
tepowaq sakola na damo niaq Robatang. palana ka to tepowaqan qawka iso kemilim timaikoan!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: nayau palana tu samulayan, mengasan ti ka!
nayao palana to samolayan, mengasan ti ka!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: nayau ta qatabanan qawtu ka!
nayao ta qatabanan qawto ka!
S.TRANSL: 那你豐年祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: kuwaya! qapalanan ku!
kowaya! qapalanan ko!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: sanu ka manna ngid isu qatalin sa damu qemizuan?
sano ka manna ngid iso qatalin sa damo qemizoan?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: tanan pa iku Rapatudan.
tanan pa iko Rapatodan.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: manna mai isu ta tukayan Rapatudan?
manna mai iso ta tokayan Rapatodan?
S.TRANSL: 為甚麼不在都市教書(當老師)?
Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: sizenges iku tu damu ku, maRengad iku tu qanengi manmu tu damu qaya.
sizenges iko to damo ko, maRengad iko to qanengi manmo to damo qaya.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: suppaR isu tumnun, tiana temud timaisuan?
soppaR iso tomnon, tiana temod timaisoan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: bai ku, ta damuan niaq mesuppaR tumnun ay lazat aizipna.
bai ko, ta damoan niaq mesoppaR tomnon ay lazat aizipna.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: manna ngid isu sinanam tumnun?
manna ngid iso sinanam tomnon?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: tumnun nani wawaway niaq, kasianem tu mai pa meRapungus ya wawaway niaq
tomnon nani wawaway niaq, kasianem to mai pa meRapongos ya wawaway niaq
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: nengi qanan isi zau.
nengi qanan isi zao.
aiku semangi ay yu!
aiko semangi ay yo!
maken satuRin isu, qatenes semangi tu zau ni?
maken satoRin iso, qatenes semangi to zao ni?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: mai, qaussiq lipayan nengi ti. yau a nisuRan ti zinmet lumuzan ta pamanmin saRazinan, Razing zau paRamesan tu meti ay zimmet qemudiqud, qanengi ti sepezan ta puduqan.
mai, qaossiq lipayan nengi ti. yao a nisoRan ti zinmet lomozan ta pamanmin saRazinan, Razing zao paRamesan to meti ay zimmet qemodiqod, qanengi ti sepezan ta podoqan.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把浸泡的糯米先蒸熟製作麴菌，麴菌和生糯米攪拌，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. Steam the soaked glutinous rice to make koji fungus. Stir the koji fungus with the raw glutinous rice and put it into the urn.

S.FORM: yau niana nibaliwan su?
yao niana nibaliwan so?
yau sidi' seRay dukiyu ku zau, nizu aiku meluma ay yu!
yao sidi' seRay dokiyo ko zao, nizo aiko meloma ay yo!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: nizan meRasa uzusa utani kelisiw?
nizan meRasa ozosa otani kelisiw?
uzusa Rasibu yau ulima betin meniz.
ozosa Rasibo yao olima betin meniz.
melizaq iku tu zau qudus, utani kelisiw?
melizaq iko to zao qodos, otani kelisiw?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: ulima Rasibu kelisiw zau.
olima Rasibo kelisiw zao.
siRis dames, qanengi qasaizan tu kiya ni?
siRis dames, qanengi qasaizan to kiya ni?
S.TRANSL: 太貴了，不能便宜一些嗎?
It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: qasukaw, mesaiz dames qasipun ti iku.
qasokaw, mesaiz dames qasipon ti iko.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: kuwaya! nayau si ngid iku tu ussiq tengen ay qudus.
kowaya! nayao si ngid iko to ossiq tengen ay qodos.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: ngid iku tu zau Rabis seRay pilit.
ngid iko to zao Rabis seRay pilit.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: uzusa melalazan kelisiw meniz, qenaliman ku senangian zau, maken qanengi daiyngan tu qatenes.
ozosa melalazan kelisiw meniz, qenaliman ko senangian zao, maken qanengi daiyngan to qatenes.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: paqsuppaR iku tu kaput qawtuan meRasa, qanengi qasaizan tu kiya ni?
paqsoppaR iko to kapot qawtoan meRasa, qanengi qasaizan to kiya ni?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: kuwaya! qasaizan ku pa tu kiya baliw timaisuan.
kowaya! qasaizan ko pa to kiya baliw timaisoan.
S.TRANSL: 好啦!賣便宜一點點給你。

S.FORM: qawtu ka temayta yu! baliw tu qudus kubu nizu yau.
qawto ka temayta yo! baliw to qodos kobo nizo yao.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: ngid iku pasanu timaisuan utani kelisiw qudus zau?
ngid iko pasano timaisoan otani kelisiw qodos zao?
S.TRANSL: 我請問你這件衣服多少錢?

S.FORM: ussiq qudus utulu Rasibu yau ulima betin kelisiw, utulu qudus ussiq melalazan kelisiw.
ossiq qodos otolo Rasibo yao olima betin kelisiw, otolo qodos ossiq melalazan kelisiw.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Rasa pa iku tu ussiq nengi ti, bula iku tu tasu ay.
Rasa pa iko to ossiq nengi ti, bola iko to taso ay.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好了，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: nengi isu, ngid iku Rasa tu senapuwaR seRay niRamazan tu imus ay 'si.
nengi iso, ngid iko Rasa to senapowaR seRay niRamazan to imos ay 'si.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: niz ti mabaliw. yau pama ya sani ay yupin, ngid isu Rasa ni?
niz ti mabaliw. yao pama ya sani ay yopin, ngid iso Rasa ni?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: kuwaya! bula iku qaussiq, muman si qawka iku Rasa tu 'may.
kowaya! bola iko qaossiq, moman si qawka iko Rasa to 'may.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: kuwa, panmuan ku pa isu sepez ta lubusan, ulima betin nazau.
kowa, panmoan ko pa iso sepez ta lobosan, olima betin nazao.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
